quotes.quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
To discover the real you, look at what you spend time thinking about when no one is looking.
We need to discover a common middle ground in which all of these things, from the city to the wilderness, can somehow be encompassed in the word â€œhome.â€
When you discover that all happiness is inside you, the wanting and needing are over, and life gets very exciting.
One day, in your search for happiness, you discover a partner by your side, and you realize that your happiness has come to help you search.

As you grow older, you will discover that your mind is the only truly limiting factor in your life. With a well developed mind you can go anywhere and do whatever. But nothing comes automatically and the best things don't come easy.
Coaching is helping people discover what they could not discover on their own, so they can become what they want to become.
Discover your deep inner-self and from that place spread love in every direction.
In order to discover the character of people we have only to observe what they love.
We discover in ourselves what others hide from us and we recognize in others what we hide from ourselves.
Sometimes, the only way to discover who we are, is by figuring out who we are not.
Discover the joy of giving and you will discover the reason for living.
We often discover what will do, by finding out what will not do; and probably he who never made a mistake never made a discovery.
One does not discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.
Without frustration you will not discover that you might be able to do something on your own. We grow through conflict.
Discover yourself, otherwise you have to depend on other people's opinions who don't know themselves.
Challenges make you discover things about yourself that you never really knew.
Try to discover The road to success And you'll seek but never find, But blaze your own path And the road to success Will trail right behind.
Those who claim to discover everything but produce no proofs of the same may be confuted as having actually pretended to discover the impossible.
All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them.
When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
Work hard to discover your gift and you will never envy or hate another human being who is manifesting theirs.
We must discover the joy of each other, the joy of challenge, the joy of growth.
We need to discover the root causes of success rather than the root causes of failure.
We learn to love our sweat, we discover our passion to move and connect it to effort, we discover both the animal in us and the power of our imagination.
Nobody can discover the world for somebody else. Only when we discover it for ourselves does it become common ground and a common bond and we cease to be alone.
The way you discover your gifts is really by serving not by searching.
The things we discover for ourselves are the most important.
